steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"21s0s","text":"Label U-bottom plate with donor, stimulation solution, name and date.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"frj3a","text":"Prepare PHA and DMSO mix separately","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chj0g","text":"Prepare and arrange the remaining stimulation solution. Mix thoroughly by pipetting up and down before adding to the experimental plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95n7f","text":"Add appropriate stimulus solution to each well in 96-well U-bottom plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
